name: LAZY LOBSTER WHOLESALE FOODS LIMITED
address: The Fishermans Landing Beach Range Road, Hythe, Kent, CT21 6HG
description: We are a family run business on Hythe Seafront, our premises are located at the Old Lifeboat Range Road Hythe.  The Food Company provide Fresh Meat, Fish, Poultry ,Dairy, Fruit & Veg and general provisions.  Our Cafe provides hot meals freshly made to order with a choice of hot & cold drinks.
